source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(booking_date)  as LatestLoad from FactBookings

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from FactBookings
where booking_date >'@{activity('LastLoad').output.firstRow.LastLoad}'
and booking_date <'@{activity('LatestLoad').output.firstRow.LatestLoad}'

scriptLines: departments as (deptName as string, employees as (empId as short, name as string, skills as string[])[])[]
